episodes.description: Animism, deities are present in every aspect of nature, lives on today in Kumano, Why does nature continue to play such an important role in Japanese spirituality? We visit a trio of revered shrines.
episodes.subtitle: Kumano: Deities of Nature
episodes.title: Spiritual Explorers

episodes.description: Mikawa in central Japan. Fireworks have long held a special significance in this region. Mikawa's traditional Tezutsu fireworks are held as an offering to its own tutelary deity who protects the land.
episodes.subtitle: Mikawa's Tezutsu Fireworks
episodes.title: Spiritual Explorers

episodes.description: Since ancient times, yamabushi, or ascetic mountain priests, were believed to have supernatural powers. Our explorers seek to understand the spirituality of yamabushi by undergoing ascetic training.
episodes.subtitle: Yamabushi: The Mountain Priests of Japan
episodes.title: Spiritual Explorers
